title: Stifled Flames
teaser: Smoke the typhlosion is looking for some heavy gagging fun, but when he meets up with a fellow bondage enthusiast, will it get too much for him?
summary: Smoke the typhlosion meets up with Orion, another typhlosion for a bondage session of gags and hoods. While Smoke has had enough after about ten layers of gags and hoods, Orion carries on despite Smoke's struggles. A latex hood is glued over Smoke and a steel helmet is welded in place, and Orion sells him off to be used.
